title: Lunar bar

properties.name: description
properties.value: A lunar bar is a bar of refined lunar ore. It is created from smelting lunar ore, granting 6.2 Smithing experience. To receive the lunar ore, players need to mine a stalagmite in the caves underneath Lunar Isle.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Lunar bar
Lunar bar
Released24 July 2006 (Update)
MembersYes
Quest itemLunar Diplomacy, The Fremennik Exiles
Properties
TradeableNo
EquipableNo
StackableNo
DestroyYou'll have to get more lunar ore to make another bar.
ExamineIt's a bar of magic metal.
Values
Value8 coins
High alch4 coins
Low alch3 coins
Weight1.814 kg
Advanced data
Item ID9077

A lunar bar is a bar of refined lunar ore. It is created from smelting lunar ore, granting 6.2 Smithing experience. To receive the lunar ore, players need to mine a stalagmite in the caves underneath Lunar Isle.

During the quests, the best way to make lunar metal objects in the fastest possible manner is to use the Superheat Item spell, then head over to Seers' Village and use the lunar bars on the anvil there. However, this bar does not require a specific Smithing level to smelt.

During Lunar Diplomacy, one bar is needed to smith into a lunar helm. During The Fremennik Exiles quest, three lunar bars are required to make the V sigil, granting 25 Smithing experience.

[[File:Lunar bar detail.png|left|150px]]
A '''lunar bar''' is a bar of refined [[lunar ore]]. It is created from smelting lunar ore, granting 6.2 [[Smithing]] [[experience]]. To receive the lunar ore, players need to mine a [[stalagmite]] in the [[Lunar Isle mine|caves]] underneath [[Lunar Isle]].

During the quests, the best way to make lunar metal objects in the fastest possible manner is to use the [[Superheat Item]] spell, then head over to [[Seers' Village]] and use the lunar bars on the anvil there. However, this bar does not require a specific Smithing level to smelt.

During [[Lunar Diplomacy]], one bar is needed to smith into a [[lunar helm]]. During [[The Fremennik Exiles]] quest, three lunar bars are required to make the [[V sigil]], granting 25 Smithing experience.
